title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.3 - Answer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.3 - Answer

State Regulations

The respondent may file an answer to the superintendent's
certification within 20 days after service upon the respondent of the notice of
hearing. The answer shall be filed with the Banking Board, and the Banking

Board shall serve a copy thereof on the superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
